file_content.text: What's with the getup? You raid the captain's footlocker or something?
My footlocker now. Field promotion. They found his body this morning.
Word is he was taken out by a sniper from House Rist. Assassination.
I hear they never miss their marks. Guess the captain was one of them.
Rest of us will be too if you both don't get back to patrol. That's an order.
